Metadata.Title: Unused HttpModules Are Removed
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that unused HttpModules are removed in the machine.config file.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
